display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Overpowering Presence F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to create an Energy Font which will damage and stun enemies and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement's chance to trigger is equal to approximately 2 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Controllers and may be slotted into most control powers.
